info.title: Products & Services
info.description:
##### Introduction The Open API serves the business functions associated with **Products and Services** offered by the bank. The operations and the features supported in this API are described in the following sections.
##### Authentication To make a request to any of the APIs, the Client has to present an Access Token, following the OAuth 2.0 specifications. Here is the API endpoint for getting an OAuth 2.0 Token.

https:\/\/api.sc.com\/retail\/v1\/oauth2\/token

Following are the request parameters to be passed to the Token endpoint.
##### Parameters
Key Value
grant_type Indicates the type of grant being presented in exchange for an access token and possibly a refresh token, for more details, please refer to the table below
client_id The public identifier for the application, obtained when the caller first registered the application
client_secret The applicationâ€™s client secret. This ensures that the request to get the access token is made only from the application, and not from a potential attacker that may have intercepted the authorization code.
Grant Type Usage
Client credentials For the client app to identify itself to the SC API platform, the /token endpoint has to be called with query param grant_type set to client_credentials
Auth-code based grant For the client app to identify itself and its user to the SC API platform, the /token endpoint has to be called with query param grant_type set to auth_code_grant
##### Error Handling The API endpoints return an error response whenever the request could not be processed successfully. In such scenarios, API provides the clients with a precise Application Error code and description in the error payload associated with HTTP Status codes 4xx or 5xx.
The table below provides a list of such possible Application Errors, for effective error handling of API consumers.
Response error code Detail
E0101 Input data is not valid
E0102 Invalid query parameters
E0103 Requested resource not found

version.description: The Open API endpoints are accessible via https only

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Information on products and services for Retail customers.

get.description: Returns a collection of Products and Services offered

parameters.name: transaction-id
parameters.description: Unique transaction reference identifier for the API request

parameters.name: category
parameters.description:
A category code that can be used to filter the output list
Code Description
CC Credit Cards
PL Personal Loans
CA Current Accounts
SA Savings Accounts
Inv Investments
Ins Insurance
ML Mortgages
TD Time Deposit Accounts

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Indicates the language code in which the product details are to be returned.

example.errMsg: fault at /retail/v1/products timeout while waiting for read

credit-cards.product-description: Standard Chartered Priority Banking Credit Card
credit-cards.fee-waiver: Waived, a maximum of 3 supplementary cards can be issued

documents: Only applicable to Priority Banking clients. Please contact our branch staff for the application details.

benefits.description: Earn 360Â° Rewards Points not only on your card spends, but on all your accounts with us. You will earn up to 50,000 points every month based on your designated banking products / services.
Earn 3X points on overseas spending, 2X points on local spending and 1X point on insurance paymentÂ all year-round. Better yet, there is no limit on the 360Â° Rewards Points you can earn.
As a principal cardholder, you can enjoy complimentary access to over 1,000 Priority Pass airport lounges all over the world within your first "Card Membership Year".

benefits.summary-title: Complimentary Travel Accident Insurance worth up to USD1,000,000
benefits.description: Enjoy our complimentary Travel Accident Insurance with a coverage of personal accident on public transport up to USD1,000,000.
Enjoy 48% off local airport limousine service between Hong Kong International Airport and your local address in Hong Kong.
Complimentary upgrade with purchase of any Tall or above-sized handcrafted beverage at Starbucks, from Tall size to Grande size or from Grande size to Venti size for all hot / cold beverages.

features.title: Annual Fee Waiver
features.data: Priority Banking customers have no annual fee on the Priority Banking Credit Card.

features.title: Complimentary Supplementary Card
features.data: We would like to extend the same recognition to your spouse and family. 3 complimentary supplementary cards are available upon request.

features.title: 360Â° Rewards Points Validity
features.data: Up to 3 years validity for 360Â° Rewards Points earned from your Priority Banking Credit Card.

features.title: Visa payWave
features.data: Enjoy the fast and secure payments with Visa payWave feature.

current-accounts.product-description: With the Standard Chartered Current Account, you will not only have the convenience of a cheque book, but you also have the added bonus of no-bounce cheque protection.

documents: Hong Kong Permanent Identity Card (You have to provide Passport or Document of Identity Proof when visit branch if you are not holding Hong Kong Permanent Identity Card.)

benefits.summary-title: With the Standard Chartered Current Account, you will not only have the convenience of a cheque book, but you also have the added bonus of no-bounce cheque protection.

features.title: Overdraft Protection
features.data: Enjoy Current Account Overdraft Protection for clearing cheques and autopays*.

features.title: Minimum Balance
features.data: Minimum opening balance as low as HK$1,000.

features.title: Autopay Setup
features.data: One-stop autopay setup.

features.title: e-Cheque
features.data: With effect from 7 December 2015, we will allow presentment of e-Cheques for deposit with us (as Payee Bank) using the e-Cheque Drop Box Service provided by the Clearing House.

terms-and-conditions.tnc-summary: + Important Note: Current Account Overdraft Protection is not applicable to all staff of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (the "Bank") or any persons who have relationship with directors/controllers/employees with lending authority.

* A protection limit of 95% of your HKD Deposits and 80% of your foreign currency deposits (Renminbi deposits is excluded) or the accumulated overdraft amount not exceeding HK$40,000, whichever is lower.

fees-and-charges.type: Please refer to the Service Charges https://av.sc.com/hk/content/docs/hk-service-charges-en.pdf

mortgages.product-description: Mortgage $aver have the interest earned from your deposits offset the mortgage expense by reducing the outstanding principal of your loan.

documents: - Proof of personal income (please refer to details below) Documents required for a 60% or under mortgage loan application: Regular Salary Earner: A bank passbook/monthly statement showing salary records for the last 2 months Non-regular Salary Earner: A bank passbook/monthly statement showing salary records for the last 6 months The latest tax return

or pay slips (bearing the name of the employer) for the last 3 months; or Proof of employment showing the job title and monthly salary of the applicant Self-employed (state ownership %): A copy of a valid business registration
and A bank passbook/monthly statement of the applicant and the company showing deposits and withdrawals for the last four months
and The latest annual tax return or audited financial report of the company
and Proof of shares allocation or state on the mortgage application your % of ownership in the company Rental Income Earner: A valid lease agreement with a residual term of 6 or more months

benefits.description: Earn up to 680,000 Asia Miles with a drawdown of HKD4,000,000 mortgage loan
Free Priority/ Premium/ Easy Banking plan with credit card, 360Â° reward and welcome offers.
Before buying your property, get a free pre-assessment of the loan amount available to you, so you know what you can afford.
Get a quick assessment of your formal mortgage application in just one day.
A calculator to show interest paid/earned between MortgageOne, Mortgage $aver and Prime Deposit Linked.
https://www.sc.com/hk/others/property-valuation.html

features.title: Maximise your Interest Earning
features.data: Deposits in the Mortgage $aver Current Account enjoy the same interest rate as your mortgage loan

features.title: Reduce your Mortgage Interest Expenses
features.data: Interests earned from your deposits directly reduces the outstanding of the mortgage, so your total mortgage interest expenses will be less

features.title: Flexible Access to Your Funds
features.data: Manage, deposit or withdraw funds from your Mortgage $aver Current Account at any time.

features.title: Deposit Protection Scheme
features.data: Deposits in Mortgage $aver Current Account are qualified for protection under the Deposit Protection Scheme up to a limit of HK$500,000 per depositor.

terms-and-conditions.tnc-summary: Key Facts Statement for Residential Mortgage Loan

loan-amount.interest-spread: H + 1.3% (Please call the Bank for the exact pricing and check the promotion page for special pricing)

personal-loans.product-description: Personal Instalment Loan - Standard Chartered Bank Hong Kong

benefits.description: Online offers up to HK$500 cash coupon
Up to HKD2,000,000 or 18x salary (whichever is lower)
APR as low as 2.38%
1-hour loan disbursement
waiver on early redemption fees and charge + 0% Handleing Fee
Application submitted before noon will be followed up within the same business day

investments.product-description: Our Investment Fund Services offer hundreds of investment funds from major fund houses, covering major fund types

benefits.description:
1. Fund Library: Powered by Morningstar allows you to compare and research funds in just a few clicks

 	 https://www.sc.com/hk/investment/investment-fund-services/research-fund-now/ 

2. Funds Select: List of quality funds in different asset classes based on in depth research

 	 https://av.sc.com/hk/content/docs/hk-funds-select.pdf

Now you can manage your portfolio online anytime, anywhere

 	 https://www.sc.com/hk/utonline/faq/ 
 	 https://ibank.standardchartered.com.hk/nfs/login.htm?lang=en_US&_ga=2.125512906.1705394487.1523322840-105523949.1516775633

Our Monthly Investment Plan helps you reach financial goals faster and easier

 	 https://www.sc.com/hk/promotion/invest/utmip/
